description:
Welcome to my apartment  that is located in a 100 year old industrial loft space in Prime Williamsburg. My space offers you 1200 sqft, a minimalist aesthetic and access to the best of Williamsburg. You will find a projector synced up with an Apple TV and a Sonos Speaker. The kitchen is equipped for meals and has a french press to go with coffee and a dishwasher. The bedroom has comfortable Casper Mattress on a sleek Japanese Platform bed with black out curtains and a white noise machine.

You can access the closet in the bedroom and the closet in the living room (without the washer) for your jackets. All other closets are for my personal use.
name: Gorgeous Industrial Loft in Prime Williamsburg
review: Vinay was an exceptional host. He even left a bottle of wine for us. Vinay was helpful and stayed in communication with me throughout my stay. The loft itself is fantastic and I would definitely stay there again. Nearby are some wonderful restaurants and even some fantastic street art. Thanks a lot Vinay!!
